item.title: Amazon MGM Studios Sets ‘Der Tiger’ as First German Amazon Original Movie to Get Local Theatrical Release
item.description: Amazon MGM Studios has set “Der Tiger,” an anti-war drama directed by Dennis Gansel, as its first German original movie to get a local theatrical release. Unfolding in 1943, “Der Tig
